# Pull Request Template

## Summary
- One-line summary of the change and its purpose.

## Related issue(s)
- Link related issues or PRs.

## What I changed
- Bullet list of changes made.

## How to test
- Steps to reproduce / test locally:
  1. npm ci
  2. npx next dev
  3. ...

## Screenshots
- Attach screenshots or recordings for UI changes.

## Security considerations
- Note if this change requires secrets or affects keys.

## Checklist
- [ ] I followed the repository Copilot instructions.
- [ ] I added/updated tests where applicable.
- [ ] I updated documentation if needed.
